title: The phenolic and flavonoid content and biological activity of Curcuma (Curcuma xanthorrhiza) fractions with different solvent polarities.
abstract: This study aimed to identify the impact of variations in solvent polarity on the solubility of secondary metabolite compounds, which were correlated as antioxidant and antibacterial agents forEscherichia coli(ATCC 11725),Salmonella sp.(ATCC 22504),Staphylococcus aureus(ATCC 11526), andBacillus subtilis(ATCC 11626).
journal: Journal of advanced veterinary and animal research
